    • isFirst

      public boolean isFirst()
      返回:
      true if the player plays firstly

    • game

      public Game game()
      返回:
      the game which the player is gaming in

    • pieces

      public java.util.Set<Piece> pieces()
      返回:
      the player's all piece

    • actions

      public java.util.List<Action> actions()
      返回:
      the actions which the player has already done

    • doAction

      public Action doAction​(java.lang.String actionType, Piece piece, Position... positions)
      generate a new action and init the action type
      参数:
      actionType - String of the type of the action
      返回:
      the object of the action created

    • sumPiece

      public int sumPiece()
      返回:
      the number of pieces

    • name

      public java.lang.String name()
      返回:
      the player's name

    • freePiece

      public Piece freePiece()
      返回:
      a free piece belonging to the player

    • findPieceByName

      public Piece findPieceByName​(java.lang.String pieceName)
      参数:
      pieceName - String of the name of the piece
      返回:
      piece object of the piece name
